units.title: FORD BRONCO - PROJECT YANKEE
units.first_description:
Project Yankee: The Ford Bronco Built to Dominate

Some vehicles are built to perform, others are built to impress—but Project Yankee does both. This custom Ford Bronco isn’t just another off-road build; it’s a statement of power, precision, and passion. Modified to perfection by Autobot Offroad, this rig sets a new benchmark for what a true off-road beast should be. And behind the wheel? None other than Lyn Macanas, a woman redefining what it means to be a car enthusiast in a world often dominated by men.


Lyn Macanas: The Lady of Iron

Lyn Macanas is more than just an Autobot Offroad ambassador—she’s a force to be reckoned with. A powerhouse in the construction industry, she has built a reputation for strength, resilience, and vision. But beyond her business empire, Lyn has another passion that knows no limits: cars. Her collection is a mix of raw power and refined engineering, ranging from American muscle to high-performance off-road machines.
units.second_description:
The Build: Performance Meets Perfection

To create a Bronco worthy of its name, the following premium upgrades were installed:

  • ARB Front, Rear, & Rock Sliders (Body Colored) – Built for durability and a sleek, custom finish. Old Man Emu Suspension – Elevating ride comfort and off-road capability.
  • Old Man Emu Suspension – Elevating ride comfort and off-road capability
  • Fuel Sinister 20x10 Wheels Wrapped in BFGoodrich Tires – Maximum traction for any terrain.
  • ARB Under Vehicle Protection (UVP) – Extra shielding for extreme trails.
  • Custom Interior with Logo Embroidery – Personalization at its finest.
  • Upgraded Grille & Carbon Fiber Steering Wheel – A bold, aggressive look.
  • Alpharex Headlights & Tail Lights – Bright, modern, and built to last
  • Mitsuba Horns – Loud, clear, and commanding presence.
  • Nacho Lights & Novsight LED System – Unrivaled night visibility.
  • ARB Roof Rack – Extra storage for adventure gear.
  • ARB Differential Breather – Protecting drivetrain components in extreme conditions.
  • Gibson Exhaust & Performance Intake – Enhanced power and efficiency.

Project Yankee isn’t just a vehicle; it’s proof of what happens when vision meets craftsmanship. With Lyn Macanas behind the wheel and Autobot Offroad behind the build, this Bronco isn’t just made to ride—it’s made to lead. Whether on the road, off the beaten path, or taking center stage at an auto show, Project Yankee is a true masterpiece of off-road engineering.

units.title: Project Black & Yellow (Jack Roberto)
units.first_description:
Ever heard of that famous line “Action speaks louder than words”? This is what Project Black and Yellow is all about. A subtle upgrade with a mean offroad performance. Indeed, looks can be deceiving. This project’s sleek modification reflects just how our client values his vehicle and how he wants it to be: TIMELESS.

No matter when and where, Project Black and Yellow will stand out both in design and performance. We know we did something right when our client comes back for more. Check out Project Black and Yellow 2.0.
units.second_description:

units.title: Project Blue Prime
units.first_description:
No one will ever take their eyes out of this Autobot custom built Ford Raptor 2021 a.k.a “”Project Blue Prime”” with its conservative yet elegant and stylish apperance. Built to make its traction stronger with aggresive mud tires;mags and an upgraded big brake kit. This truck is ready to traverse anywhere off-road without the inconvenience of noisy tires. It’s huge but “”Blue Prime”” is equipped with a progressive coil spring coupled with our trusted upper control arm that ensures a more comfortable long ride plus that rock light, side shooter and scene lights helpful for your rugged off-road adventures.

How do you hop in? The truck is in style with an automatic step board that could carry up to 300 lbs. That automatic power board is exciting, right? The front’s design is elevated with a fwell-built front bumper plus a GME Antenna; LED 30-inch light bar; Bass Horn – you better hear how intense this sounds; a SR-L series spreader plus that bold blue ultra hook. The side shooter is installed on the front left and with Grille lights and headlight. The roof rack is surrounded by scene lights and has a central LED light bar that makes it brighter in the dark.
units.second_description:
How do you hop in? The truck is in style with an automatic step board that could carry up to 300 lbs. That automatic power board is exciting, right? The front’s design is elevated with a fwell-built front bumper plus a GME Antenna; LED 30-inch light bar; Bass Horn – you better hear how intense this sounds; a SR-L series spreader plus that bold blue ultra hook. The side shooter is installed on the front left and with Grille lights and headlight. The roof rack is surrounded by scene lights and has a central LED light bar that makes it brighter in the dark.



PROJECT BLUE PRIME

  • HAMER NOVA SERIES REAR BUMPER
  • VLAND TAIL LIGHT SMOKE
  • HAMER OBP POWERBOARD AUTOMATIC STEPBOARD

units.title: Project Monster Camsur
units.first_description:
“It’s like two worlds are colliding with Project CAMSUR when the owner, Mr Lray Villafuerte, wants to build his rig that will be able to live through the demands of his work and the rush of his lifestyle. We vividly remembered that he personally came into our HQ and planned together on how he wants his Ranger Raptor to come out.

Inspired by the hidden adventures of Camsur and the adventurous lifestyle of Mr. Lray Villafuerte, this project is totally equipped to withstand them all.

With its black and red color combination, “Camsur” came out very sophisticated. The set up comes with a head turner front bumper and a 12,000 pounds synthetic rope winch. There’s a smooth 30-inch Light bar that just fits perfectly with the bumper. The light is an 8-beamer pattern adjustable using GPS depending on your speed. To match the body, we put on a neat and simple hood scoop with the satin black finish accent. Size is just proportion to its full body – not bulky. The skid plate is repainted in black (originally silver) but wait, there must be more for Camsur.
units.second_description:
This ranger undergone a 4-inch lift using a coil spring upgrade. The wheel set is a gloss black-red milled 20x 10 -18 offset partnered with the crowd’s favorite 35×12.5 R20 aggressive mud tires for more traction. To ensure both beauty and performance, we also had to upgrade the breaking power using a 6-colliper with 355mm rotor disc Big Break Kit. For its exhaust system, we decided to install a catback single side exit not to worry about removing the spare tire.

You will be hopping in using an automatic step board that could extend to up to 5 inches down. Inside your rig, you get access to your lights switch and a throttle controller to eliminate delays and increase acceleration. We installed a reclinable flat side seat so you can get inside the driver’s seat with no difficulty.

Project Camsur would overcome the night using the LED bar lights roof mounted in a bracket that is nice and sturdy. Behind the raptor is a simple roll bar with a mesh installed with 3 pieces rail guard to avoid scratches and dents and your ultimate towing C-clamp partner.

This truck is a sweet representation of sophistication and ingenuity. A reflection of the owner’s style, energy and certainty. “



PROJECT CAMSUR

  • BUGATTI HEADLIGHT
  • HAMER KING SERIES FRONT BUMPER
  • HAMER TITANIUM ROLLBAR
  • BUSHWACKER FLARES
  • KING COIL SPRINGS
  • PROFENDER UPPER CONTROL ARM
  • RIGID ROCKLIGHTS AMBER
  • RIGID LED BAR 50 INCHES’SR FORGED SHACKLES
  • UNICORN 5 INCH DROPKIT
  • RANGER BI-BRAND SKIDPLATE
  • FUEL VAPOR 20×12 – NITTO MUD GRAPPLER 35/12.5R20
  • RAPTOR GRILLE

  • VLAND TAIL LIGHT SMOKE

units.title: Project Monster Rap 2.0 (Von Ordoña)
units.first_description: Remember that feeling when you finally achieved your dream as a kid? How about that feeling when you finally got what you saved up for after enduring what felt like a never ending sacrifice? Victorious. It is this sense of fulfillment which was experienced not only by our client but also by the Autobot family upon seing the conclusion of Project Monster Rap 2.0. Nothing inspires us more than the challenge of helping a client get that dream ride.
units.second_description:
Project Monster Rap 2.0 is a testament to a renowned vlogger’s humble beginnings, hard work, and perseverance. These deserve nothing but the best of the best out of Autobot’s modification and upgrade. From walking the roads of Project 8 and just passing by Autobot Autoworks Offroad while dreaming about modifying his future ride to actually driving that future in his own hands. Just being a part of our client’s achievement is already a victory on its own.



PROJECT MONSTER RAP 2.0 ( Ford Ranger )

units.title: Project Ignite
units.first_description: We are “”Fueled by God.”” This is what manifests to every little thing that we do and our inspiration for the Project Ignite. The Fiery Hue appearance of this jeep combined with an unparalled and trusted brands we got for modification gives it a feel of courage and passion.
units.second_description:
Ignite is significant as it bears our “”10th year Anniversary”” front bumper emblem. Equipped with the iconic tough grille and hood scoop matched with that sleeky Bushwacker Flat Flares, its exterior is without a doubt astonishing. It also gets you ready for any off-roading without any worries with an upgraded big break kit into its mud tires and Mags. Of course, we made sure the lights installed front and back will be prominent after dark.



PROJECT IGNITE

  • BUGATTI HEADLIGHT

units.title: Project Miles Morales
units.first_description:
Admit it. As a kid, there were times when you imagined being in a different world while riding in your parent’s car at the backseat. You pictured yourself taking on the world, driving your own car and coursing through different adventures. This is exactly what project Miles Morales is all about. Driven by this vivid imagination, we took the creativity of this ride’s owner as an inspiration and let his personality flow throughout his truck.

No doubt that driving in the metro can be very taxing. Most of the time, it is up to us to get creative and amuse ourselves amidst the chaos. This is why in each modification and upgrade for project Miles Morales, we made sure that the riding experience is like stepping into your own mutiverse.
